name: Monospaced Lovers — Demo Day 21
description:
Make friends, dodge bullets, and uncover the truth in this narrative platformer. Early demo (art/music is placeholder). Controller supported!

Changes since DD20:

  • A few more NPCs hanging around the town
  • Improved camera
  • Throwable items
  • Transition to new (but still empty) scene
  • Can now collect 2 coins, 1 data chip, and clear the Bloodthirsty Slime quest.

Known Issues:

  • FPS drops in the chat interface when the backlog gets long. Something to do with the text renderer I'm using.

Keyboard controls:

MOVE - Arrow Keys
JUMP - Space
USE/THROW - C
INTERACT - Up
DASH - X
MENU - Z
CAMERA PAN - Shift + Arrow Keys
PAUSE - Escape
